Display a prominent display of restaurant's logo and contact information

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available cakes with images and descriptions
endpoints.page_context: Home Page, Menu Page, Inventory Management Page

endpoints.description: Search for cakes based on user input
endpoints.page_context: Home Page, Menu Page, Inventory Management Page

endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific cake
endpoints.page_context: Home Page, Menu Page, Inventory Management Page

endpoints.description: Create a new order with cake customization options
Retrieve available pickup and delivery options with associated costs and estimated times
Process payment for an order using a dummy payment gateway
Create a new user account
Login to an existing user account
Retrieve a list of orders for a logged-in user
Retrieve restaurant logo and contact information
Filter cakes by price, flavor, or popularity
Retrieve a list of cake categories or sub-categories
endpoints.request_body: None. This endpoint does not require any parameters or request body.
endpoints.response: A JSON array of cake category objects. Each object contains the category id, name, and description. Example: [{id: 1, name: 'Birthday Cakes', description: 'Cakes for birthday celebrations'}, {id: 2, name: 'Wedding Cakes', description: 'Cakes for wedding celebrations'}]

endpoints.description: Add a cake to the user's cart

request_body.cakeId: integer, the ID of the cake to add
request_body.quantity: integer, the quantity of the cake to add

customizations.flavor: string, the flavor of the cake
customizations.design: string, the design of the cake
customizations.message: string, the message on the cake

response.cartId: integer, the ID of the cart

cartItems.cakeId: integer, the ID of the cake
cartItems.quantity: integer, the quantity of the cake

customizations.flavor: string, the flavor of the cake
customizations.design: string, the design of the cake
customizations.message: string, the message on the cake

endpoints.description: Retrieve the user's cart contents

response.cartId: integer, the ID of the cart

cartItems.cakeId: integer, the ID of the cake
cartItems.quantity: integer, the quantity of the cake

customizations.flavor: string, the flavor of the cake
customizations.design: string, the design of the cake
customizations.message: string, the message on the cake

endpoints.description: Create a new user account
Login to an existing user account

request_body.username: string, required, the username of the user
request_body.password: string, required, the password of the user

response.token: string, the authentication token for the user
response.user_id: integer, the ID of the user
response.error: string, error message if login fails

endpoints.description: Retrieve a paginated list of cakes
Retrieve a list of available cake options with images and descriptions
endpoints.request_body: None. No parameters or body required for this endpoint.
endpoints.response: A JSON array of cake option objects. Each object contains: id (unique identifier), name, description, image_url, price, flavors (array of available flavors), designs (array of available designs), and sizes (array of available sizes). Example: [{id: 1, name: 'Chocolate Cake', description: 'Moist chocolate cake', image_url: 'https://example.com/chocolate-cake.jpg', price: 40.00, flavors: ['chocolate', 'vanilla'], designs: ['round', 'square'], sizes: ['6-inch', '8-inch']}]

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available cake flavors
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required
endpoints.response: JSON array of cake flavor objects, each containing 'id' (unique identifier), 'name' (flavor name), and 'description' (brief description of the flavor)

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available cake designs
endpoints.request_body: None. No parameters or body required for this GET request.
endpoints.response: A JSON array of cake design objects. Each object contains the design ID, name, description, image URL, and price. Example: [{id: 1, name: 'Buttercream', description: 'Classic buttercream design', imageUrl: 'https://example.com/buttercream.jpg', price: 50.0}, {id: 2, name: 'Fondant', description: 'Smooth fondant design', imageUrl: 'https://example.com/fondant.jpg', price: 60.0}]

endpoints.description: Create a customized cake with chosen options

request_body.delivery_address: object (required if pickup_or_delivery is delivery, containing street, city, state, zip)
request_body.payment_method: string (required, e.g. credit card, paypal, etc.)

response.custom_cake_id: integer (unique identifier for the custom cake)
response.total_cost: decimal (total cost of the custom cake)

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available pickup options
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required for this endpoint
endpoints.response: JSON array of pickup options, each option containing: id (unique identifier), name (pickup option name), description (pickup option description), availability (array of available dates and times), address (pickup location address)

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available delivery options
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required

data.id: integer, unique identifier for the delivery option
data.name: string, name of the delivery option (e.g. 'Standard Delivery', 'Express Delivery')
data.description: string, brief description of the delivery option
data.price: number, price of the delivery option
data.estimated_delivery_time: string, estimated time of delivery (e.g. '2-3 business days')
data.available_areas: array of strings, areas where the delivery option is available

endpoints.description: Validate a user's input address for delivery

request_body.address_line_1: string, required, the first line of the address
request_body.address_line_2: string, optional, the second line of the address
request_body.city: string, required, the city of the address
request_body.state: string, required, the state of the address
request_body.zip_code: string, required, the zip code of the address
request_body.country: string, required, the country of the address

response.is_valid: boolean, whether the address is valid for delivery
response.error_message: string, optional, an error message if the address is not valid
response.suggested_address: object, optional, a suggested address if the input address is not valid
response.delivery_estimate: string, optional, an estimated delivery time or date if the address is valid

endpoints.description: Calculate the total cost of the customized cake

request_body.delivery_address: object (optional, with properties: street, city, state, zip)

endpoints.description: Add the customized cake to the user's cart

request_body.cake_id: integer, the ID of the cake to be added to cart
request_body.flavor_id: integer, the ID of the flavor chosen for the cake
request_body.design_id: integer, the ID of the design chosen for the cake
request_body.message: string, the message to be written on the cake
request_body.quantity: integer, the number of cakes to be ordered

response.cart_id: integer, the ID of the cart
response.cake_id: integer, the ID of the cake added to cart
response.flavor_id: integer, the ID of the flavor chosen for the cake
response.design_id: integer, the ID of the design chosen for the cake
response.message: string, the message to be written on the cake
response.quantity: integer, the number of cakes ordered
response.total_cost: float, the total cost of the cake

endpoints.description: Proceed to payment for the customized cake

request_body.payment_method: string, payment method (e.g. credit card, paypal)

response.payment_url: string, URL to redirect to for payment
response.total_cost: float, total cost of the order

endpoints.description: Process payment for the customized cake

request_body.cake_id: integer, unique identifier for the cake
request_body.payment_method: string, payment method used (e.g. credit card, paypal)
request_body.pickup_or_delivery: string, pickup or delivery option chosen by customer
request_body.pickup_time: string, pickup time chosen by customer
request_body.total_cost: float, total cost of the cake

response.payment_status: string, status of the payment (e.g. success, failed)
response.transaction_id: string, unique identifier for the transaction
response.order_id: integer, unique identifier for the order

endpoints.description: Create a new user account

request_body.username: string, required, unique username chosen by the user
request_body.email: string, required, unique email address of the user
request_body.password: string, required, password for the user account
request_body.first_name: string, optional, first name of the user
request_body.last_name: string, optional, last name of the user

response.user_id: integer, unique identifier for the newly created user account
response.username: string, username chosen by the user
response.email: string, email address of the user
response.token: string, authentication token for the user

endpoints.description: Retrieve a user's order history
endpoints.request_body: No request body. Query parameters: userId (integer, required), pageNumber (integer, optional, default=1), pageSize (integer, optional, default=10)
endpoints.response: JSON array of order history objects. Each object contains: orderId (integer), orderDate (string, ISO 8601 format), orderTotal (decimal), orderStatus (string), cakeDetails (object with cakeId, cakeName, cakeDescription, cakePrice), customizationDetails (object with flavor, design, message), pickupOrDelivery (string), paymentMethod (string)

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of selected cakes with their details

cartItems.itemId: integer, the ID of the cart item
cartItems.cakeId: integer, the ID of the cake
cartItems.quantity: integer, the quantity of the cake

customizations.flavor: string, the flavor of the cake
customizations.design: string, the design of the cake
customizations.message: string, the message on the cake

cartItems.price: decimal, the price of the cake

endpoints.description: Update the quantity of a cake in the cart

request_body.quantity: integer, the new quantity of the cake

response.itemId: integer, the ID of the cart item
response.quantity: integer, the new quantity of the cake

deliveryOptions.optionId: integer, the ID of the delivery option

fields.name: userId
fields.description: The ID of the newly created user

fields.name: message
fields.description: Message indicating that the user was created successfully

endpoints.description: Returns the terms and conditions page content
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required

content.terms_and_conditions: string, the content of the terms and conditions page

endpoints.description: Redirects to the login page

response.redirect_url: string, the URL of the login page
response.status_code: integer, the HTTP status code for the redirect (e.g. 302)

endpoints.description: Retrieve user's account information
Retrieve user's order history with order details
Search orders by date, order status, or cake type
Re-order a previous cake
Retrieve user's loyalty or reward points
Update user's account information
Update user's password
Logout user from the system
endpoints.request_body: The request body for this endpoint should contain no parameters. It is used to invalidate the current user's session, effectively logging them out of the system.
endpoints.response: The response should be a JSON object with a boolean 'success' property indicating whether the logout was successful, and a 'message' property with a corresponding message. For example: { 'success': true, 'message': 'User logged out successfully' }

endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary of user's recent orders
Filter orders by date range or order status
Retrieve the customer's name and contact information
Retrieve overall sales and revenue metrics
List all current and pending orders with order status
Find specific orders by customer name, order ID, or date
Update order status and add notes to orders
Display a calendar view of upcoming orders and pickups
Show low-stock alerts for cake ingredients and decorations
Retrieve cake menu items
Add a new cake menu item
Update an existing cake menu item
Remove a cake menu item
Retrieve customer accounts and order history
Retrieve order history for a specific customer
Retrieve payment processing metrics
Retrieve restaurant settings
Update restaurant settings
Integrate with POS system to automatically update inventory levels
Returns a list of available POS systems for integration
Connects to a POS system using the provided API key or credentials
Disconnects from the currently connected POS system
Returns the current integration status and connection history of the POS system
Updates the cake inventory in the website based on the POS system data
Manually overrides the POS system data for cake inventory or availability
Returns the connection history of the POS system
Handles errors that occur during POS system integration or synchronization
Returns the credentials of the currently connected POS system
Updates the credentials of the currently connected POS system
Add a new cake to the inventory
Remove a cake from the inventory
Update the quantity of a specific cake in the inventory
Update the details of a specific cake, including description, price, and customization options
Retrieve a list of cakes with limited availability
Update the availability of a specific cake (e.g. mark as 'out of stock' or 'available')
Retrieve overall inventory levels and statistics
Generate a report on cake sales
endpoints.request_body: None, query parameters: date_range (optional, format: YYYY-MM-DD - YYYY-MM-DD), cake_type (optional, e.g. birthday, wedding, etc.)
endpoints.response: JSON object with sales report data: {total_sales: float, sales_by_cake_type: {cake_type: string, sales: float}[], sales_by_date: {date: string, sales: float}[]}

endpoints.description: Generate a report on inventory levels
endpoints.request_body: None, query parameters: ingredient (optional, e.g. flour, sugar, etc.), supplier (optional, e.g. name of supplier)
endpoints.response: JSON object with inventory report data: {total_inventory: float, inventory_by_ingredient: {ingredient: string, quantity: float}[], inventory_by_supplier: {supplier: string, quantity: float}[]}

endpoints.description: Retrieve contact information, including phone number, email, and physical address
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required

endpoints.description: Retrieve business hours
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or request body required
endpoints.response: JSON object containing business hours, e.g. {"monday": {"open": "9:00 AM", "close": "6:00 PM"}, "tuesday": {"open": "9:00 AM", "close": "6:00 PM"}, ...}

endpoints.description: Retrieve social media profiles
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required
endpoints.response: JSON array of social media profiles, each containing 'id', 'platform' (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter), 'handle', and 'url' properties

endpoints.description: Retrieve FAQ section for common inquiries
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or request body required
endpoints.response: JSON array of FAQ objects, each containing 'id', 'question', and 'answer' properties, e.g. [{"id": 1, "question": "What is the order cutoff time?", "answer": "Orders must be placed by 5pm for next day pickup"}, ...]

endpoints.description: Submit contact form with fields for name, email, and message

response.message: string, e.g. 'Contact form submitted successfully' or 'Error submitting contact form'
response.data: object, optional, additional data related to the submission

endpoints.description: Upload files or images for custom cake inquiries

request_body.description: The request body should be a multipart/form-data object containing a file or image.

parameters.file: The file or image to be uploaded.

response.description: A JSON object containing the uploaded file's metadata.

structure.filename: The name of the uploaded file.
structure.filetype: The type of the uploaded file.
structure.filesize: The size of the uploaded file in bytes.
structure.fileurl: The URL of the uploaded file.

endpoints.description: Retrieve restaurant location to display on map
endpoints.request_body: None, no parameters or body required
endpoints.response: JSON object with restaurant location details, e.g. { latitude: float, longitude: float, address: string, city: string, state: string, zip: string, country: string }
